editions.effect: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. Then you may banish a card with **floating memory** from your graveyard. If you do, put CARDNAME into %your%its owner's% memory. *(You still pay for the costs of the materialization.)*
editions.effect_raw: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. Then you may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, put Refresh Chamber into its owner's memory. (You still pay for the costs of the materialization.)
editions.effect_html: Materialize a Bullet card from your material deck. Then you may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. If you do, put Refresh Chamber into your its owner's memory. (You still pay for the costs of the materialization.)

rule.description: You may choose to fail to find a card from your material deck to materialize.
You still pay the costs of the materialization.
